ygData.subject: Re: National Day Celebration.-Guking
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah Piah. This is by far the most ambitions and biggest expedition organised so far! for most of us) No wonder u wield parang toh.. hmm... respect
ygData.messageBody:
Wah Piah.

This is by far the most ambitions and biggest expedition organised so far!
for most of us)
No wonder u wield parang toh.. hmm... respect respect(covering my most
"priv" area while i says that)

In recallin past expedtions...( burry images fads in......looks very
bloody..worst then QUAKE..)
...well i think better not to mention...... not so nice
experineces....especally the last GUk gathering i started long time ago....

This time lets be prepare. U ppl go to the army alredi or not?? huh?
Plan , Plan Plan...

Theres Some mutiple choice questions for everyone

1 : when a team memeber dies. How many ppl in group should stay behind to
help????
a) Alll b) one c) none d) disband him from group

2: While 4 ppl has turn up at the meeting point on THE appointed time. 2
others r on thier way and might take 20 mins to reach meeting point.
(a) die die wait for the 2 to come (b) Proceed on expedtion (c) 1 from the
4 wait for the 2 (d) wait for 10 mins the most, then tell the 2 to go fly
kite if they dont show.

The point here is, be prepared. im not saying we r NOt. we can do better....
now..who has the map of the expedition area? hey go recee lor.print map
firstlor.. ideally all should have map.

those r thoughts.. lets have yours..

Yiyang
rubbing me hands thinkin about GUK.


-----Original Message-----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 8:56 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] National Day Celebration.


>From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
>Not really. Silvered plate has slightly lousier AC but is light. However,
they are on mobs that
>are of higher lvl than mob who has bronze stuff.
>
>My plan is that I'll hopefully hit lvl 22-24 by 2 days before National Day
and we can form 3
>groups to dash guk.
>
>Group 1:
>
>Garren (tank, predicated to hit 30 at that time.)
>Leshrec (nuker)
>Ziltus (nuker)
>Yiyang (tank)
>Sereph (talk cork, sing song and play mahjong)
>Trifrost (all-in-one sans crowd control)
>
>Group 2 and 3 (decide who joins who among yourself and who act as the
leader. If ponteng,
>please send an MC to me)
>Einan (healer)
>Kellendil (nuker, crowd control)
>Zanderion (nuker, tank provider)
>Kalandra (nuker, tank provider)
>Nicademous (tank provider)
>Aaleku (healer, tank)
>Kellindel (healer, tank)
>Sunblade (healer, tank)
>Yutaka (as if he'll EVER join, rank 1ST on my TBCNC, to be chop and
castrated, list)
>Neriss (all-in-one, but like no response one.....)
>
>If possible, we get a few of our guild people to join us. BUT the max is we
form at most 3 FULL
>groups to fight in Guk. Too many will cause lag.
>
>We will ALL be binded at Grobb by Kellendil and Nicademous since they can
get past the guards
>without invis. The rest of us will be invis and wait patiently for them to
bind us and zone
>when you sight a ogre
>
>Will put up more info a week before the hunt.
>
>While people fly flag to celebrate National days, we let out DANGEROUS
fireworks and chop frog
>to celebrate it.
>
>LKW wrote:
>
>> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>>
>> Wat's BS tunic? Bullshit tunic? heheh j/k.
>>
>> Btw, is silver plate better than brozne plate?
>>
>> On Tuesday, 20 July, 1999 5:20 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
>> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>> >
>> > When I get my BS tunic, I'll go over to PF. but not b4 then.
>> >
>> > LKW wrote:
>> >
>> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> > >
>> > > Permafrost is quite a nice place for xp and loot (only refers to
those
>> > > tougher gobs beyond the flag room). I spend 5 hrs there last night
>> > > soloing, and half of the time I'm the only soul in the zone. If we
can
>> > > find a full house of lvl 18-22 to camp there, I believe all will lvl
pretty
>> > > fast. The normal gob, thou mostly green to me, hit pretty hard. I
also
>> > > lost count how many times I zone last night, due to train, probably
more
>> > > than 30 times ;) The casters give pretty good loot and xp, and some
even
>> > > drop bronze armors. Initially we go there as a 3 wiz, 1 magi, 1 bard
and 1
>> > > shaman team. Frankly speaking the fire power is pretty strong but
down
>> > > time is long due to the fact that we have to tank alot and spend time
>> > > resting and med. I believe if we can get 2 real-tanks, life will be
much
>> > > easier. The place got a good mixture of melee & caster mobs. Tanks
also
>> > > have problem soloing due to the caster mobs. Last night a lvl 20
shaman
>> > > and a lvl 20 warrior come in as a group (the other is a lvl 17 wiz,
solo),
>> > > they also kena bang out of zone due to those gob diviner, medi and
priest.
>> > > Those caster mobs' HP is pretty low, can killed them normally within
2-3
>> > > casts. H/w, the tricky part is some of them heal VERY fast and hit
VERY
>> > > hard (lighting shock ~ 120dam per cast). If u dun waste them b4 they
heal
>> > > themselves, u will find yaself in a very tough fight. Tat's how the
lvl 20
>> > > warrior get killed at zone - he thought only 1 gob medi small fry and
I was
>> > > monitoring the gob medi HP. I see it drop below 50% 3-4 times and
when it
>> > > heals, it go back to at least 75%. In the end the warrior kena
whacked
>> > > till death. Another problem that u need a caster in the group is
becoz
>> > > thos gob are very cunning mobs. When u hit them to 10-20% hp, they
sure
>> > > flee into the tunnel, and within 30-60 sec, u will see a train of 3-5
gobs
>> > > charging out ;)
>> > >
>> > > I spend 5 hrs there (until 4am) just to fill up one bubb. Unless
there is
>> > > kakis interested to camp there, I will go Lake to fight birdman
tonight.
>> > > PF is very wulu wulu (thanks to Sereph's recommendation), usually
not more
>> > > than 10 (last night not even 5 during my 5 hrs stay) and it's really
a
>> > > power lvling ground for those who can survive. Sereph said he spend
a
>> > > month there for his enchanter to gain from lvl 20 to 30, so must be
good
>> > > lah. If u guys wanna bash SG like what Sereph's enchanter is doing,
come
>> > > join me, hehe.
>> > >
>> > > Ziltus
>> > >
>> > > p/s: Unless u go beyond flag room and hunt, otherwise the loot is
pretty
>> > > lousy for those gob outside enar zone. I earn less than 10pp last
night
>> > > for a 5 hrs hunt. HH probably give much better loot but not as good
xp for
>> > > the lvl 20s.
>> > >
